column1: Little Goat Diner////The roof bar was everything you could hope for in a rooftop - comfortable couch seating
column2: bar staff knocking down drinks with the customers
column4: and everyone just generally having a great time. It's small
column5: reminds me of a casual summer get together on the roof deck of a condo
column6: but the giant goat reminds that yes
column7: you are at a restaurant by the Top Chef herself.
